title: Windows 7 SP1 Ultimate 64bit 12in1 OEM ESD en-US May 2015
description:
* Windows 7 SP1 64bit 12in1 OEM ESD en-US May 2015


 [ RELEASE INFO ]


 * File: Win7.X64.OEM.ESD.en-US.May2015.iso

 * Sources: X17-59465 & dvd 677651
		
 * Size: 3,58GB
 * Format: Bootable ISO

 * CRC32: c551d22c
 * MD5:	29613a36aafe0da0ea2c0de0b40fdfd8
 * SHA-1: dfb903b69f60baf2caaa30e58c5974dbfac53aa4
 
 * Language: en-US [English - USA]

 [ CONTENTS ]

 * Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

 * Internet Explorer 11
 * .NET Framework 4.5.2 (KB3035805)
 * Security & important Updates - 2015-05-12

 * Setupcomplete / Post-install:
 
 * KB890830
 * Defender Updates

 [ FEATURES ]

 * Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)
 * install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)

 <a href=" http://postimg.org/image/boz50x5wb/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://postimg.org/image/boz50x5wb/</a>

 [ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

 * Windows 7 Home Premium / OEM / OEM +
 * Windows 7 Professional / OEM / OEM +
 * Windows 7 Enterprise / OEM / OEM +
 * Windows 7 Ultimate / OEM / OEM +

 ( OEM = Activation excludes manufacturers info etc )
 ( OEM + = Activation includes manufacturers info etc )


 * OEM and OEM + (Original Equipment Manufacturer) will automatically activate 

 * if installing same version on original equipment.

 * OEM + (if HP, Asus, Toshiba, etc), will input manufacturers login screen,

 * wallpaper, system properties logo and User Account logo.

 * If you choose non-OEM (eg Custom Build) you can activate with

 * Daz Loader or KMS in WPI screen at end of install.

 * Testing has shown that if you choose OEM for Custom Build, wallpaper,etc still

 * gets applied but will not automatically activate. In this instance use WPI.

 [ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

 * A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.

 * All optional applications except 7-Zip and WinRAR uses web installers **

 * that will install the latest available version for you.

 * Web installers requires connection to internet.

 * To activate Enterprise, select "Enterprise Only".

 * For all other editions, select "Daz Loader".

 * Choose any optional application(s).

 * Click on "Begin Install" to execute your choices.

 * To skip activation and optional applications, just click on "Exit".

 * Activators: Daz Loader v2.2.2.0 & KMSpico v10.0.4 Portable Edition.

 * Both Activators Potential False Positive Virus Alarm 

 [ Optional software ]

 * Google Chrome
 * Mozilla Firefox
 * Opera Chromium
 * 7-zip 9.30
 * Adobe Reader
 * DirectX
 * Flashplayer
 * Java JRE
 * Malwarebytes
 * MSE
 * Notepad++
 * WinRAR 5.21
 * GOM Player
 * VLC Player
 * Winamp

 ** Web installers https://ninite.com/ 


 [ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

 * NOTE!

 * A boot.wim from Win 8 is used to get Win7 to work with ESD format.

 * This makes setup resemble Win 8, but it is 100% Win7.

 * No upgrades, only clean installs.

 * Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus, 

 * (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.


 * Hope you will enjoy this release!

 * Regards,
 * Generation2 @ KAT & TPB[/b]
